name: Delphox
flavorText:
It gazes into the flame at the tip of
its branch to achieve a focused state,
which allows it to see into the future.

previous.name: Braixen
previous.flavorText:
It has a twig stuck in its tail. With
friction from its tail fur, it sets the
twig on fire and launches into battle.

next.name: Froakie
next.flavorText:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

pokemon.name: Fennekin
pokemon.flavorText:
Eating a twig fills it with energy,
and its roomy ears give vent to air
hotter than 390 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Braixen
pokemon.flavorText:
It has a twig stuck in its tail. With
friction from its tail fur, it sets the
twig on fire and launches into battle.
